channel.title: UTIAS MarsDome on UofT ADR Team
channel.description: Recent content in UTIAS MarsDome on UofT ADR Team

item.title: Racing Dome Construction Started
item.description: We announce the start of construction for our new drone racing arena in the UTIAS dome. This development marks a significant milestone for our team, addressing the long-standing need for a larger and more convenient racing area. Previously, we relied on the motion capture room in the Learning Systems & Robotics Lab, which was too small and inconvenient for our growing needs. The new racing dome will provide a spacious flying and tracking area, tailored to our requirements.
